title: Award-Winning Heritage Sydney Designer Escape by Ovolo with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Treat yourself to a stay at one of Australia’s most eclectic designer hotels, just a short stroll from the iconic Darling Harbour. The heritage hotel is housed in a 19th-century wool store, embracing industrial chic with exposed brick walls, recycled timber and vibrant street art pieces. While admiring the splendour of this boutique retreat, head downstairs and indulge in the intimate surroundings of the onsite Mister Percy - Pyrmont's neighbourhood wine bar - serving up classic Mediterranean flavours with seasonal local produce. Strategically located only moments from Sydney's iconic landmarks, feel free to explore Barangaroo's harbourside dining and entertainment precinct just across the glistening water.

Stroll across the footbridge that connects Pyrmont to the Barangaroo precinct to explore SEA LIFE Sydney Aquarium, Circular Quay and the Sydney Opera House, or catch a ferry to tranquil Rose Bay or Watsons Bay. There is also a mouthwatering array of culinary delights on your doorstep, including seafood fixes at Sydney Fish Market, an array of diverse dining at The Star Sydney and the bustling Chinatown - all within easy reach.

title: Award-Winning Sydney Ovolo Designer Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
You are invited to experience one of Australia’s most eclectic designer hotels: Sydney's Ovolo 1888 Darling Harbour. The former 19th-century wool store has been converted into an Instagram-worthy landmark. The heritage-modern boutique hotel is adorned with eye-popping artwork and sits in a prime Sydney location, just across the water from Barangaroo's harbourside dining and entertainment precinct.

Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Best of the Best 2021 award - an accolade reserved for only the top 1% of properties worldwide - this grown-ups' playground is strategically located only moments from Sydney's iconic landmarks, hatted restaurants and vibrant bars. Begin (or end) your nights onsite in style at Pyrmont's luxe neighbourhood wine bar, Mister Percy, then retreat to your uber-cool sanctuary.

title: Heritage Sydney Designer Escape by Ovolo with Room Upgrade, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Just a short stroll from Sydney's iconic Darling Harbour awaits one of Australia’s most acclaimed designer hotels: The Woolstore 1888 by Ovolo. Lovingly housed in a 19th-century wool store, this heritage and boutique hotel conjures an industrial chic ambience unlike anywhere else, with exposed brick walls, recycled timber and vibrant street art working in harmony to astound and inspire. After you settle in, head downstairs and indulge in the intimate surroundings of the onsite Mister Percy - the neighbourhood's favourite wine bar - serving up classic Mediterranean plates accented with seasonal local produce. 

Ready to explore more? Sydney's iconic locales, including Barangaroo, Circular Quay and the Sydney Opera House, are all located just across shimmering waves. The city's famed ferry service stands ready to whisk you away to Rose Bay or Watsons Bay. There is also a mouthwatering array of culinary delights on your doorstep, including seafood fixes at Sydney Fish Market, The Stay Sydney and Chinatown, all within easy reach.

title: World-Class Luxury - Central Coast NSW
description: Making Conde Nast Traveler’s 2018 Gold List, we’d have to agree that the ultra-premium Pretty Beach House - nestled high in the treetops within New South Wales’ Bouddi National Park - is one of the best hotels in the world. Radiating romance in true seclusion (though only 90 minutes from Sydney or less via seaplane!), this all-inclusive, adults-only retreat overlooking the dreamy Pretty Beach is a true testament to luxury. Highly personalised menus are tailored to individual guests tastes, alongside a fully-stocked bar with premium wines and spirits. All this plus use of mountain bikes, two AU$50 spa credits and a welcome Indigenous smoking ceremony.
offer_address: 83 High View Rd, Pretty Beach NSW 2257

title: Boutique Sydney Ovolo Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
You’re invited to experience one of Australia’s most glamorous boutique hotels with an urban escape to the iconic Ovolo 1888 Darling Harbour. A former wool store, this circa-1888 building has been converted into an Instagram-worthy destination with heritage-inspired designer interiors and a prime Sydney location, just across the water from the Barangaroo harbourside dining and entertainment precinct.

Treat yourself to an urban retreat in the heart of Sydney, where you'll enjoy daily continental plated breakfast, a complimentary minibar replenished daily, a welcome loot bag and an indulgent 12pm late checkout, subject to availability. With a complimentary candy station and social hour with a complimentary round of wine, beer and plated snacks included in your stay between 5pm and 6pm daily, this designer hotel is the ultimate adults' playground.

**This deal has NO surcharges**: travel anytime for the same great price.

description: You’re invited to experience one of Australia’s most glamorous boutique hotels with an escape at the iconic Ovolo 1888 Darling Harbour. Recognised as one of the best hotels in Australia, this former woolshed has been transformed into the insta-worthy weekend destination of your dreams. title: Five-Star Country NSW Cottage Retreat with Swimming Pool
description: If you’re planning the perfect rural escape, look no further than Evanslea Luxury Boutique Accommodation in Mudgee. This charming retreat offers comfortable cottage stays amid lush gardens and is close to amazing wineries, great restaurants and breathtaking scenery - ensuring endless opportunities for fun and relaxation. This five-star, four-and-a-half-acre property boasts a majestic lake lined with lush greenery, a tennis court and a refreshing outdoor pool.

vendor_name: Rydges Australia Square (Formally The Tank Stream Hotel Sydney (EVT Hotels & Resorts: Independent Collection by EVT)
title: Modern Sydney CBD Stay Near Circular Quay & Pitt Street Mall with Onsite Dining
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant heart of Sydney with a stay at this central launchpad. Rydges Australia Square boasts cosy rooms, each offering a peaceful escape from the city's energetic pulse. Eat and drink your heart out onsite: indulge in French-inspired cuisine, refresh your palette with a spritz at the wine bar or opt for in-room dining for the perfect night in.

Step outside and find yourself moments from the architectural marvel of Australia Square and the historic The Rocks district. Venture a little further to discover harbourside dining at Circular Quay or take a stroll to the Royal Botanic Garden. With the city's celebrated art galleries, museums and shopping precincts within easy reach, this hotel gives you access to the best of central Sydney.
offer_address: 97-99 Pitt Street, Sydney, New South Wales 2000, Australia

title: New South Wales Coast: All-Inclusive Luxury Couples Retreat near Bouddi National Park
description: Nestled in the Bouddi Peninsula just 90 minutes north of Sydney, the seven-acre Pretty Beach House property is the embodiment of Australian outback luxury. With four exquisite pavilions to choose from - Treetops Pavilion, Bayview Pavilion, Hideaway Pavilion and The Retreat - this all-inclusive haven provides unrivalled seclusion and elegance, complemented by world-class hospitality and an array of lavish amenities. Enjoy breathtaking intimate dining spaces, a wine cellar, magnificent sandstone open fireplace, infinity pool and a hand-crafted Stefano Ferrara pizza oven - all designed to make you feel at home. Authentic, earthy interiors and unique bespoke soft furnishings await, with plush mud-brick walls and sandstone floors engulfing the entire property.
offer_address: Highview Road, Pretty Beach, Bouddi Peninsula 2257, New South Wales, Australia

title: Byron Bay Beachfront Wellness Retreat with Beach Lounge, Outdoor Activities & Adults Only Enclave
description:
Set on 50 acres of native bushland and sand dunes fronting Belongil Beach, this luxurious, design-led escape lets nature set the pace and barefoot elegance reign. Just a few minutes north of Byron Bay, the resort feels a world away with private villas inspired by the surrounding ecosystems - Dunal, Rainforest, Eucalypt and Wetlands - each thoughtfully crafted with natural textures.

Days unfold slowly here, with mornings spent on a daybed at the adults-only pool or floating in the vast central lagoon shaded by palms. Azure Bar and Grill serves seasonal dishes made from local ingredients, while the Botanica Beach Lounge spills out onto the sand with plush lounges and ocean views.

Sink into serenity at Osprey Spa, or if you're feeling adventurous, the resort's outdoor activities range from sunrise horse rides along the beach to dips in the surf and forest walks through tea tree groves. Even getting into town is a dream, with the world's first solar-powered train accessible from the resort ready to take you gliding through the dunes to Byron’s heart.
offer_address: 144 Bayshore Drive, Byron Bay, New South Wales 2481, Australia

title: Harbourfront Newcastle Escape with Glittering Outdoor Pool
description: Plentiful beaches, lush hinterland and the historic harbourfront await when you escape to the stylish Rydges Newcastle. With a contemporary design and spacious rooms overflowing with coastal charm, the hotel sits in the heart of the city, just steps away from shimmering beaches, boutiques and cafés. Make the most of the glistening pool, restaurant and bar, before exploring this charming destination, affectionately known as 'Newie'.
offer_address: Wharf Rd and Merewether St, Newcastle NSW 2300

title: Contemporary Sydney Airport Stay with Cocktail Bar & Rooftop Cinema
description: Recharge at Citadines Connect Sydney Airport, a stylish hotel located just a 10-minute stroll from Sydney Airport's Domestic T2 Terminal. Home to a collection of contemporary rooms flaunting ample space to stretch your plane legs, this conveniently located hotel offers all you need for a great night's sleep. Stock up on tasty meals and snacks at Grab & Go, get moving in the retro-inspired Athletic Club, ascend to the Penthouse level and relax at the cocktail bar, then catch a flick at the rooftop cinema.
